altTitles.ja: 裏バイト:逃亡禁止

description.en:
Ura baito, also known as a shady part-time job: a gray area job that pays very well. The price you pay is your life.  
Yume Kokuryo and Nagomi Shirahama are seeking a large sum of money for some reason. 
To that end, they casually dive into various shady part-time jobs. 

This work may affect you physically and mentally. Read it at your own risk. 
We are not responsible for any damage to your health.

In the office, Taejoon reigns supreme as the "Cupid of Sales," renowned for successfully pairing colleagues thanks to his ability to see the color of people's auras. Unfortunately, he himself has been single his entire life. But everything changes when he drunkenly kisses the new recruit, Hongyeon, which leads to a sizzling night at a motel. And then Taejoon discovers something fascinating - Hongyeon's aura is a mesmerizing rainbow! As Hongyeon boldly pursues him, Taejoon's shyness clashes with their steamy connection. Now they must navigate a somewhat clumsy and spicy office romance, where colors will fly in more ways than one!

description.pl: Od gotowania, przez sprzątanie, po wszystko pomiędzy, Ha-yeon jest idealną pomocą domową! Jest tylko jeden problem... Woojin, który zarabia na życie tłumacząc powieści erotyczne, ciągle widzi swoją gorącą pomoc domową w swoich fantazjach! Może to tylko brak doświadczenia Woojina w sypialni sprawia, że jest sfrustrowany seksualnie, ale musi zająć się tą sytuacją, zanim sprawy wymkną się spod kontroli. Stary przyjaciel Woojina, złośliwy Sol, wysyła mu coś, aby spróbować mu pomóc, ale kiedy Ha-yeon przyłapuje Woojina w najbardziej kompromitującej pozycji z prezentem, czy to szokujące odkrycie będzie zbyt dużym obciążeniem dla nich obojga, aby je udźwignąć?

description.en: Jang Gwangnam's life as he grows the guard tribe that protects the Kana-Shi city.

title.en: Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 痣だらけのクラスメイトが心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Classmate Who's Covered in Bruises
I'm Worried About My Classmate That's Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pt-br: Estou preocupado com minha colega de classe coberta de hematomas

altTitles.ro: Sunt îngrijorat Pentru o Colegă Acoperită de Vânătăi

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей однокласснице покрытой синяками

altTitles.tr: Her Tarafı Bandaj Kaplı Olan Sınıf Arkadaşım Hakkında Endişeleniyorum

altTitles.vi: Tôi lo lắng cho người bạn cùng lớp đầy những vết bầm tím

description.en: A story from the perspective of a concerned protagonist and a female classmate who's suspiciously covered in bruises.

"Young Master Chi, you're not going to help me unconditionally, are you?"

"You'll find out soon enough what this deal entails. Now, all you need to do is give me an answer. Do you want this opportunity or not?"

"Yes, I do."

Chi Mingyao made a deal with an actor who was brave enough to block him because of a car accident. He only wanted to tease the little actor at first, but eventually, he genuinely wanted to befriend Li Yangxiao and pass on his good luck to him—all so that Yangxiao could chase his dreams without a care in the world.

title.en: School Infirmary Nurse That Wants to Teach Adult Stuff

altTitles.ja: 筆下ろしたい保健室の先生

altTitles.en: Infirmary Teacher Who Wants to Have a Playmate
School Nurse Who Wants to Take a Younger Student’s Virginity

altTitles.vi: Cô giáo ở phòng y tế muốn động thủ

altTitles.ja: アークナイツ OPERATORS!

description.en:
The popular four-panel comic strips from the official Arknights Twitter account have finally been collected into a book!

In addition to the individual episodes of the 22 operators, the stories "The Great Chief Returns", "Mansfield Break", "Under Tides", and other event comics are also included. This is a must-have book for fans, to help you find the operator who is just right for you!
description.pt-br: A história segue os membros do grupo Rhodes Island, um grupo criado com o propósito de proteger e ajudar pessoas infectadas com Oripatia. Acompanhe o dia a dia deles enquanto fazem seu trabalho.

title.en: Ore no Level Up ga Okashi! ~ Dekiru Otoko no Isekai Tensei

altTitles.ja: 俺のレベルアップがおかしい！ ～デキる男の異世界転生～

altTitles.en: My level up is strange! ~ Reincarnation of a great Man in a Different World

altTitles.id: Level Up-ku aneh!  ~ Reinkarnasi Manusia Hebat di Dunia lain

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Level Up ga Okashi! ~ Dekiru Otoko no Isekai Tensei

description.en: Zarmen, an adventurer who can't level up decides to retire from the adventurer business. Furthermore, in order to graduate from virginity, he decided to splurge on all the assets that I had diligently saved up since his reincarnation at a high-class brothel. The woman who appeared in front of him was the finest woman he would ever have known. Thanks to her hospitality, Zarmen fully enjoys his first time, but at that moment, his ears hear a mysterious announcement, "Impregnation confirmed.", "Level up!" "Does this mean that the more "seeding" you do, the stronger you get?"An extraordinary implantable foreign world adventure fantasy created by a bottom adventurer who has been at level 1 for many years levels up through sex!
description.id: Petualang "Zarmen" yang tidak bisa marah memutuskan untuk pensiun dari bisnis petualangan.  Selain itu, karena belum lulus dari keperawanan, dia memutuskan untuk membelanjakan semua kekayaan yang telah dia kumpulkan sejak dia bereinkarnasi di rumah bordil mewah.  Apa yang muncul di depannya adalah seorang wanita luar biasa yang tampaknya tidak memiliki hubungan selama sisa hidupnya.  Berkat keramahannya, Zarmen sepenuhnya menikmati seks pertamanya, tetapi pada saat dia berada dipuncaknya, sebuah pengumuman misterius muncul "Level up!" Terdengar di telinganya!  Ini adalah sebuah fantasi petualangan yang aneh dimana petualang terbawah level 1 selama bertahun-tahun tumbuh melalui segs.
description.ja:
うだつの上がらない冒険者“ザルメン”は、冒険業からの引退を決意。さらに童貞も卒業するため、転生してから今までせっせと貯めてきた全財産を高級娼館でひと思いに散財することにした。
そんな彼の前に現れたのは、彼には一生縁のなさそうな極上の女。彼女のもてなしもあり、ザルメンは初めてのセックスを十分に堪能するが、イッた瞬間、彼の耳には「着床を確認しました。レベルアップ！」という謎のアナウンスが！
「これってもしかして、“種付け”するほど強くなるってこと…？」
万年レベル1だった底辺冒険者がセックスを通して成り上がる、奇想天外な着床系異世界冒険ファンタジー！

title.en: Ibitsu na Koi no Seesaw Game

altTitles.en: The Seesaw Game Of Distorted Love

altTitles.ja: いびつな恋のシーソーゲーム

description.en: Inspector Sudo is known for always successfully retrieving the items stolen by the notorious thief Grey – a master of disguise who is able to steal the goods even though he sends the police a notice on what he intends to steal beforehand. How is Sudo able to get the stolen items back from this evasive burglar?
description.pl: Іnѕреktоr Ѕudо znаnу јеѕt z tеgо, żе zаwѕzе оdzуѕkuје рrzеdmіоtу ukrаdzіоnе рrzеz nоtоrусznеgо złоdzіеја, Grеуа, mіѕtrzа сhаrаktеrуzасјі, którу роtrаfі соś bеz рrоblеmu ukrаść nаwеt wtеdу, gdу wуѕуłа wсzеśnіеј роlісјі zаwіаdоmіеnіа. Аlе… јаk іnѕреktоrоwі udаје ѕіę оdzуѕkаć ukrаdzіоnе рrzеdmіоtу оd tеgо nіеuсhwуtnеgо włаmуwасzа?

title.en: Koushaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta node, Mental Otome na Ore wa, Zenryoku de Onnanoko wo Tanoshimimasu

altTitles.ja: 公爵令嬢に転生してしまったので、メンタル乙女な俺は、全力で女の子を楽しみます

altTitles.en: Since I Have Been Reincarnated as the Daughter of a Duke, I, the "Girl Inside," Will Enjoy Being a Girl as Much as I Can!

description.en:
A humble man in his twenties suddenly dies and is reborn as the daughter of a duke in an 18th-century lookalike world where magic exists!
He is now living a second life as the adorable "Miranda Mirandiehl," who looks like a doll.
As he was always a "girl inside" with girlish interests, he accepted his reincarnation surprisingly easily.
And so, after being reborn as Miranda, he will enjoy his new life to the fullest!
What kind of encounters await him, and what lies ahead in his gender-swapped otherworldly reincarnation life?

Lee Jungwoo is the member of an unpopular idol group <Sweet Devils>, with the stage name 'Lucifer'. Despite accepting all kinds of programmes and odd jobs in the hopes to make it big someday, his one claim to fame turns out to be an unfortunate accident on live-tv. Misunderstandings ensue and suddenly he finds himself entangled with national superstar, Kang Kwonjun.
A young boy moves into a new house. But there's something hiding under his bed.

Mister, have sex with me. My crush’s son likes me. You confessed to me with that face of yours. That face that resembles your father’s so much. I should’ve never come close to you…I don’t want to be like this with you when I hate you, but…!

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
The cute Kyuu-chan is a wonder cat. Dance, sing, be happy together!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

description.en: Even angels give into temptation. Once God’s right-hand warrior, the archangel Agnes has succumbed to desire and formed a contract with Lucifer, the ruler of demons. Now a fallen angel, she poses as a simple taxi driver and patrols the bustling city of Seoul during the midnight hours. Cursed by the king of hell to seek souls for her life force, Agnes pursues depraved individuals who prey upon innocents for their own pleasure, and uses their carnal desires against them. But when her past comes back to haunt her, a tantalizing game of cat and mouse involving vengeful entities ensues.

altTitles.ja: アイツノカノジョ

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

altTitles.en: Plaything: The Toy of a Grand Duke

description.en: A robust and naive mercenary, Ilrick, accidentally killed the son of the leader of his unit, who was after Ilrick's body. After he believed that he had successfully concealed his crimes, Ilrick received the summon of an unexpected individual. With flowing silver hair, the individual was the most handsome man Ilrick had ever seen in his life- the Grand Duke of Miros. The duke graced a chillingly beautiful smile on his face as he spoke to Ilrick. "Isn't it only correct for you to be the one asking me to fuck you up?"

altTitles.ja: 忍べよ！ストーカー, Shinobeyo! Stalker,Perseguidor Ninja!

description.ja: As a runaway ninja, Benimaru has little to no prospects in life. As he was lying in the woods, contemplating his death, a stranger approaches him and gives him back his will to live. Benimaru finds out that the man was none other than the province's feudal lord's son, Lord Shinosuke Kiyohisa Yamato. Putting his skills to use, Benimaru sneaks around and secretly looks after Lord Shinosuke, who may be much more clueless than he lets on...

title.en: She Changed So Much in One Year

altTitles.ja: １年で変わってしまった彼女

altTitles.ja-ro: Ichi nen de Kawatte Shimatta Kanojo

title.en: Saikyou Yuusha Party wa Ai ga Shiritai

altTitles.ja: 最強勇者パーティーは愛が知りたい

altTitles.en: Hero's Party Want to Experience LOVE

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyō Yūsha Pātī wa Ai ga Shiritai

description.en:
The strong and popular hero won't let me (the unpopular mage) go for some reason!!!
The adventures of the strongest hero's party is full of strange love.

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

title.en: The childhood friends are off in their own world

altTitles.ja: ふたりの世界に誰も入れない幼馴染百合

altTitles.ja-ro: Futari no Sekai ni Dare mo Hairenai Osananajimi Yuri

altTitles.pt-br: Um amor Yuri entre amigas de infância em um mundo só nosso, onde ninguém mais pode entrar.

description.en: Recently, Siwon has been lively. This is because he has fallen inlove with Soyoung, a therapist he had met after receiving physiotherapy. Siwon has appeared quite a few times in front of Soyoung, but Soyoung doesn't give out affection easily. Siwon, who is faced with constant rejection, always keeps a smile on his face. This makes Soyoung look at him with an unknown smile on his face.

altTitles.ja: アップルパルフェ おねロリ百合アンソロジー

description.en:
The relationship between "girls" and "women".
A completely new yuri anthology of "onee-and-loli" stories, all by different authors.

Cover: Kawaku

**Chapters**:
1. **Mashiro-chan's future lover** (Mashiro-chan no Mirai no Koibito, ましろちゃんの未来の恋人) by Itou Hachi
2. **Midnight funeral Where I can't let it be found** (Zettai ni Bare te wa Ikenai Soushiki 24-ji, 絶対にバレてはいけない葬式２４時) by Canno
3. **Scent and reflection** (Kaori to Kaze, 香りと影) by Terayama Den
4. **The Place Where We Belong** (Futari no Ibasho, ふたりの居場所) by Hazuki
5. **My Little Sister's Loved One** (Imouto-chan no Daisuki na Mono, 妹ちゃんの大好きなもの) by Izumi Kirifu
6. **Koma-chan and Sensei's Time** (Koma-chan to Sensei no Jikan, こまちゃんとせんせいのじかん) by kurimo.
7. **Failure** (Dame na Hito, だめなひと) by Masanaga
8. **A Dream of Spring on a Tatami Mat** (Ichi-jou Shunmu, 一畳春夢) by Sakasana

title.en: Ore no Kokan wa Bishoujo Datta no ka

altTitles.ja: 俺の股間は美少女だったのか

altTitles.en: Turns Out My Dick Was a Cute Girl

altTitles.zh: 我的牛牛变成了美少女

altTitles.pt-br: Acontece que meu pau era uma linda garota

description.en:
A young man wakes up to a small surprise: He doesn't have his dick anymore!
Follow Kosuga, a 2nd Year Highschool  Student, as he lives his life with his dick who turns out to be a cute girl!
description.tr:
Genç bir erkek uyandığında küçük bir sürprizle karşılaşır: Artık çüksüzdür!
Lise 2. Sınıf Öğrencisi Kosuga'nın çükü sevimli bir kıza dönüşür ve macerası başlar!!
description.vi:
Một cậu trai trẻ đón nhận một bất ngờ: Cậu không còn "thằng nhỏ" nữa!
Theo chân Kosuga, nam sinh năm 2 trung học cùng với bé "ciu" hóa thành một cô gái.
description.pt-br:
Um dia um jovem acorda com uma pequena surpresa: Ele não tem mais pênis!
Acompanhe Kosuga, um estudante do 2º ano do Ensino Médio, enquanto ele vive sua vida com o seu pau que acabou de se tornar uma linda garota!

title.en: My Sister's Best Friend, My Lover.

altTitles.ja: 姉の親友、私の恋人。
Ane no Shinyuu, Watashi no Koibito.

description.en: Sena is a novelist who has been dealing with romantic feelings for her sister, Yuuna. Upon learning that Yuuna is to be married, Yuuna's best friend and former lover Kiku asks Sena to be her lover...

title.en: Destiny Unchain Online ~Kyuuketsu-ki Shoujo to natte, Yagate 『Aka no Maou』 to Yobareru You ni Narimashita~

altTitles.ja: Destiny Unchain Online 〜吸血鬼少女となって、やがて『赤の魔王』と呼ばれるようになりました〜

altTitles.en: Destiny Unchain Online: After Becoming a Vampire Girl, I Eventually Became Known as "Crimson Demon King"

altTitles.th: Destiny Unchain Online เดสทินี อันเชน ออนไลน์ ~เมื่อผมกลายเป็นสาวน้อยผีดูดเลือดแล้วถูกขนานนามว่าจอมมารสีชาด~

altTitles.zh: Destiny Unchain Online 〜成为吸血鬼少女，不久后被称为『红之魔王』〜

altTitles.ko: Destiny Unchain Online 데스티니 언체인 온라인 〜흡혈귀 소녀가 되어, 이윽고『붉은 마왕』이라 불리게 되었습니다〜

description.en: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
description.id: Mitsuki kou, seorang gamer dengan skill hebat yang memiliki nama lain,  yaitu "pemburu kepala Cream". Berpartisipasi dalam sebuah game baru "Destiny Unchain Online" yang dibuat oleh ayahnya sebagai tester perangkat game baru, tetapi segera setelah dimulai, karena sebuah bug ia menjadi gadis vampir. Ketika ia bertemu dengan teman-teman yang baik, pada saat itulah ia akan mulai menyelesaikan game, sebuah cerita tentang seorang gamer terbaik yang segala sesuatunya berubah…… sudah di mulai!
description.ja: 神がかったプレイヤースキルを持ち「首狩りクリム」の二つ名で知られるゲーマー、満月紅。父親が作った新作ゲーム『Destiny Unchain Online』に新型ゲームデバイスのテスターとして参加するが、開始早々バグだらけで姿は吸血鬼種族の少女に。最高の仲間と出会い、ゲームを攻略して行くうちに、何もかもが変わっていく最高のゲーマー物語……開幕！
description.ko: 압도적인 스킬을 가지고「목 사냥꾼 크림」이라는 별명으로 알려진 게이머, 미츠키 코우. 아버지가 만든 신작 게임 『Destiny Unchain Online』에 신형 게임 장치 테스터로 참가하지만, 시작하자마자 오류투성이로 흡혈귀 종족의 소녀가 되어 버리는데. 최고의 동료와 만나고, 게임을 공략해 나가다 보니,모든 것이 변해 가는 최강 게이머 이야기… 개막!
description.th: มิตสึกิ โค เกมเมอร์ฝีมือฉกาจที่รู้จักกันในนาม ‘คริมนักล่าหัว’ ได้เริ่มเล่นเกม ‘Destiny Unchain Online’ ที่พ่อของเขาสร้างในฐานะเทสเตอร์ของเครื่องเล่นเกมรุ่นใหม่ล่าสุด แต่ไม่ทันไรก็เจอบั๊กมากมายจนกลายเป็นเด็กสาวเผ่าผีดูดเลือดไปซะอย่างนั้น เรื่องราวของเกมเมอร์ผู้เก่งกาจที่ทุกอย่างเริ่มเปลี่ยนไปเมื่อได้พบกับพรรคพวกสุดเจ๋งและผจญภัยในโลกแห่งเกม... เปิดฉากแล้ว ณ บัดนี้!

altTitles.ja: 飛野さんのバカ

description.en: Class president and overall good girl Koguma is concerned that her classmate Hino often skips classes by spending her time behind one of the school buildings. Koguma feels it's her duty to guide Hino down a better path, even if it means going along with Hino's unusual requests.
description.pt-br: A presidente da classe e boa garota em geral, Koguma, está preocupada com sua colega de classe, Hino, que muitas vezes mata aula, passando o tempo atrás de um dos prédios da escola. Koguma sente que é seu dever guiar Hino por um caminho melhor, mesmo que isso signifique concordar com os pedidos incomuns de Hino.

altTitles.ja: モデルちゃんと地味マネさん

description.en: A cool model and a manager’s romantic comedy begins!

altTitles.ja: 夢でフラれてはじまる百合

altTitles.en: Our Yuri Started with Me Getting Rejected in a Dream

altTitles.id: Kisah Yuri Kita Berawal Dari Diriku yang Ditolak di Dalam Mimpi

altTitles.en: Yuri That Starts With Getting Rejected In a Dream

altTitles.fr: Notre histoire commença lorsque ma confession fut rejetée dans mes rêves

altTitles.zh: 从梦里被拒绝开始的百合

altTitles.fr: Notre relation Yuri a commencé lorsque ma confession s'est fait rejeter dans mes rêves.
Notre histoire saphique commença lorsque ma déclaration amoureuse ne fut pas réciproque dans mon rêve

description.en:
For your very average high school girl, Tsukushi, there's her cool and beautiful childhood friend (with some very particular weaknesses) Hinoka. Tsukushi always thought they would be normal childhood friends forever… That is until Tsukushi saw Hinoka rejected her confession in a dream.   The hypnagogic romantic comedy between a cheery maiden, and a cool girl which begins with a dream, starts right now!

 [Serialization of Popular Twitter manga by Hijiki](https://mangadex.org/title/088db207-6c42-4fa9-9e6f-1b831c21c1ac/a-yuri-manga-that-starts-with-getting-rejected-in-a-dream)
description.id: Tsukushi bermimpi ditolak saat menyatakan cintanya pada sahabatnya, Hinoka. Satu mimpi yang akan selalu menghantuinya, dan membuatnya mulai melihat Hinoka dengan cara yang berbeda.

altTitles.lt: AÅ¡ voras, ir kas iÅ¡ to?

altTitles.id: Aku ini laba laba, lalu apa ?

altTitles.sv: Jag är en spindel, vadå då?

altTitles.no: Jeg er en edderkopp, hva så?

altTitles.pl: No i co z tego że jestem pająkiem?

altTitles.ru: Да, я паук, и что же?
Да, я паук, и что с того?

altTitles.fa: من یک عنکبوتم. خب که چی؟

altTitles.th: แมงมุมแล้วไง, ข้องใจเหรอคะ?

altTitles.ja: 蜘蛛ですが、なにか？

altTitles.de: Ich bin eine Spinne, na und?!

altTitles.pt-br: Então eu sou uma aranha, e daí?

altTitles.en: So I'm a Spider, So What?

description.en:
When a mysterious explosion killed an entire class full of high school students, the souls of everyone in class were transported into a fantasy world and reincarnated. While some students were reincarnated as princes or prodigies, others were not as blessed.  
Our heroine, who was the lowest in the class, discovered that she was reincarnated as a spider! Now at the bottom of the food chain, she needs to adapt to the current situation with willpower in order to live. Stuck in a dangerous labyrinth filled with monsters, it's eat or be eaten!  
This is the story of a spider doing whatever she can in order to survive!
description.ru: В результате необъяснимого происшествия с участием пикселей класс обычных японских школьников погибает, но перерождается в другом мире. А нашей героине, которая была самой непопулярной в классе, повезло куда больше. Она переродилась пауком в подземелье, полном опасностей. Сможет ли она, используя лишь свою хитрость и удачу, выжить?
description.pt-br: Quando uma misteriosa explosão mata toda uma classe cheia de alunos do ensino médio, as almas de todos na sala de aula são transportadas para um mundo de fantasia e reencarnados. Enquanto alguns estudantes foram reencarnados como príncipes ou prodígios, outros não foram tão abençoados. Nossa heroína, que era a menor na classe, descobriu que ela estava reencarnado como uma aranha!? Agora, na parte inferior da cadeia alimentar, ela precisa se adaptar à situação atual com a força de vontade para viver! Preso em um labirinto perigoso, repleto de monstros, é comer ou ser comido! Esta é a história de uma aranha fazendo tudo o que puder para sobreviver!

altTitles.ja: アトリ マイ ディア モーメンツ

altTitles.vi: ATRI - Những hồi ức thân thương

description.en: “ATRI -My Dear Moments- is a popular novel game. This work, which boasts strong popularity both domestically and internationally, has been adapted into a comic by Jako with a transparent touch. In a calm town sinking into the sea, the “unforgettable summer” of a boy and a robot girl begins.”

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: My Sect's Senior Disciple Has a Hole in His Brain

altTitles.en: There's a Pit in My Senior's Brain
There's Something Wrong with My Da Shixiong's Brain

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Jia Da Shi Xiong Nao Zi You Keng

description.en:
The hilarious adventures of the eldest disciple of a sect who has a problem with his brain. Dong Fang Xian Yun was reincarnated as the most senior disciple of the Carefree sect. But the only thing that goes through his mind is to make sure he doesn't end up dying by the hands of the "main character". Read as he makes no sense to his fellow disciples while avoiding flags left and right.  
  
*Note : Although there are many chapters listed as missing, nothing is actually missing, some of chapter combining into one.*

"The only taste you need to know is mine."  
  
A chance reunion after 10 years for Hiro and Kiriya. They were "kiss-friends" during their last summer of high school: a memory from the past which Hiro wants to forget. However, even after turning 27, his memory of those times keeps binding him to the point he can't date anyone. Kiriya on the other hand, even after the reunion, kept his cool, but… These cool men intense feelings are welling up!

altTitles.ja: 灰色の陰陽師

description.en: Sabatora, a boy whose parents were killed by Kuragari, works as an Onmyoji for the Public Security Bureau to get revenge. His only comfort is Kyue, a Kuragari who lives with him. Kyue, who has lived with Sabatora since he was a small child, is a kind and gentle soul who is like an irreplaceable member of Sabatora's family. One day, however, Kyue is attacked by Seto, a colleague from the Public Security Bureau who hates Kuragari. In a pinch, Sabatora and Kyue undergo an unexpected transformation.(natalie.mu)
description.ja:
人間を食い殺し世を脅かす【暮明】。公安の陰陽寮に所属する陰陽師の鯖虎は、丑三つ時になると暮明を退治する生活を送っていた。

そんな鯖虎には1つの秘密が…。両親を失い唯一の家族【きゅえ(暮明)】を隠れ家で匿っているのだった。

だが上司の陰陽師に秘密がバレてしまったことで生活は一変!! 暮明に与する者は外敵と見なされ…!? 指名手配されてしまった鯖虎! 反逆のダークヒーロー譚ここに開幕!!

altTitles.ja: トライガン・マルチプルバレッツ

description.en:
Trigun is back with a heavily armed posse of talented gunslingers. An anthology of tales, Multiple Bullets features the hard-to-find story Badlands Rumble by Trigun's creator Yasuhiro Nightow. Plus original stories from Boichi, Yusuke Takeyama, Satoshi Mizukami, Kennji Mitsuyoshi and Koichi Ishikawa's studio Ark Performance, Akira Sagami, humor cartoonist Yuga Takauchi and Masakazu Ishiguro.  
  
**Contents:**  
- Trigun Badlands Rumble by [Nightow Yasuhiro](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=Nightow%20Yasuhiro)  
Vash is caught in a sticky situation with the evil Dodongo Bros. until Wolfwood saves him and they retreat. In the city, they meet with two men who want to hire Vash & Wolfwood to protect their city from those very same Dodongo Bros.  
  
- Trigun: The Lost Plant by [Boichi](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=Boichi)  
A short one shot written and drawn by Boichi featuring Vash the Stampede set after the events of Trigun Maximum. (Included at the end of Sun-Ken Rock vol 12)  
  
- Denizens of the Sand Planet (Suna no Wakusei no Tami) by [Satoshi Mizukami](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=Mizukami%20Satoshi)  
  
- Les Enfants by [Ark Performance](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=Ark%20Performance)  
  
- Eisei Mil Mer TV (Mil/Mer TV) by [Yuga Takauchi](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=Takauchi%20Yuuga)  
  
- Trigun: Rising by [Takeyama Yuusuke](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=Takeyama%20Yuusuke)  
A oneshot to celebrate the release of the Trigun movie. The story focuses on Rai The Blade, one of the Gung-Ho Guns, who is living in a small Plant town.  
  
- Cutting is Fighting by [Akira Sagami](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=Sagami%20Akira)  
  
Also includes illustrations by [Masakazu Ishiguro](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=Ishiguro%20Masakazu)

altTitles.ja: 天より高く

description.en: When the Devil King announces his retirement, he calls forth his two sons, Yomi and Sora, to give them each a quest. Whichever of them finds a pure Yamato maiden within a year would inherit the throne of the Devil King, while the other would die. Thus begins Sora's sex-fuelled adventure to find a woman that can satisfy his father…

title.en: Wǒ zài liàn zōng bèi yǐng hòu hòumā qiángzhì àile

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ zài liàn zōng bèi yǐng hòu hòumā qiángzhì àile

altTitles.zh: 我在恋综被影后后妈强制爱了

altTitles.ru: Мачеха заставила меня в неё влюбиться

altTitles.en: I was forced to love by my stepmother
Stepmom made me fall in love with her

description.en:
Ruan Tao, who originally wanted to dominate the entertainment world, encounters his malicious stepmother at the very beginning of his career. However, the stepmother is a great actress who dominates the world of entertainment with an iron fist. Ruan Tao can only submit and at the same time think about how to overthrow the evil stepmother's reactionary forces!

As a result, she is arranged to participate in a romance reality show with her stepmother, but who is to tell her that it isn't a young love reality show with men and women courting each other? What is the plot when the stepmother holds her hand and asks with concern, fearing that she will hurt herself?
description.zh: 明艳腹黑大影后小妈x骄纵任性小辣椒女儿 原本想要称霸娱乐圈的阮桃一出道就撞上了自己黑心的后妈，奈何后妈是在娱乐圈只手遮天的大影后，阮桃只能夹着尾巴做人，顺便想着怎么才能打倒恶毒后妈的反动势力！结果就被安排和后妈一起参加恋综，可是谁来告诉她，不是男女嘉宾卿卿我我的青春恋爱综艺吗?后妈拉着她的手嘘寒问暖生怕她磕着碰着是什么剧情?

altTitles.ja: ヲタクに恋は難しい

altTitles.en: Wotakoi: Love Is Hard for Otaku

altTitles.id: Cinta itu Sulit untuk Seorang Otaku

altTitles.es: Qué difícil es el amor para un otaku

altTitles.pl: Wotakoi. Miłość jest trudna dla otaku

altTitles.pt-br: Wotakoi: O amor é difícil para otakus

altTitles.th: ยากแท้จริงหนอรักของโอตาคุ

description.de:
Narumi ist ein Vollblut-Nerd. Doch ihre Liebe zu Manga und Anime trifft bei Normalo-Männern nicht gerade auf Verständnis – sobald sie hinter ihr Geheimnis kommen, nehmen sie Reißaus! Zum Glück bietet sich ihr alter Kindheitsfreund Hirotaka – selbst hoffnungsloser Game-Nerd – als Freund an. Aber kann die Rechnung Nerd + Nerd = Liebe wirklich aufgehen?

The Big Bang Theory trifft auf Manga – eine herrlich durchgeknallte Rom-Com nicht nur für Nerds!
description.en: Narumi Momose has had it rough: every boyfriend she’s had dumped her once they found out she was an otaku, so she’s gone to great lengths to hide it. When a chance meeting at her new job with childhood friend, fellow otaku, and now coworker Hirotaka Nifuji almost gets her secret outed at work, she comes up with a plan to make sure he never speaks up. But he comes up with a counter-proposal: why doesn’t she just date him instead? In love, there are no save points. [Kodansha]
description.es:
"Cuando me preguntan qué clase de manga es Qué difícil es el amor para un otaku, como no estoy muy segura de si es un shojo, uno romántico o un manga cómico, al final explico que es un combate de amor entre integrantes de una especie diferente."

Fujita

Él, un gamer empedernido. Ella, una fujoshi. Ambos guardan sus secretos bajo su apariencia profesional. ¿Podrán mantener una relación sin revelarlos o sin que sus pasatiempos se interpongan entre ellos?
description.fr: Narumi et Hirotaka travaillent dans la même société. Ce sont tous deux des otaku. Ils ont chacun une passion dévorante pas toujours évidente à faire entendre aux autres. Peut-elle même être compatible avec une relation amoureuse ? Comprendre l'autre, l'accepter tel qu'il est, se montrer tel qu'on est vraiment... Misant sur ce point commun, «des otaku,» ils décident alors de sortir ensemble. Mais comme dans toutes les histoires d'amours, des interrogations et des doutes persistent. Leur passion va-t-elle les rapprocher ou les séparer? Heureusement les amis sont là pour en discuter mais aussi pour partager leur «otaku attitude.»
description.id: Kisah percintaan Narumi Momose amat sulit. Dia diputuskan oleh pacarnya setelah sang pacar tahu kalau Narumi adalah fujoshi. Akhirnya dia memutuskan untuk pindah kerja dan menyembunyikan kenyataan kalau dirinya seorang otaku di kantor barunya. Tapi di tempat kerja barunya dia malah bertemu dengan Hirotaka Nifuji, teman masa kecilnya yang tampan dan terampil tapi otaku gamer kelas berat. Mendengar keluhan Narumi mengenai otaku yang tidak akan berhasil dalam cinta, Hirotaka pun mengajak Narumi berpacaran sebagai sesama otaku!? “Kalau aku pasti akan menemanimu mengumpulkan material atau naik level. Aku nggak akan mengecewakanmu atau membuatmu menangis Ditambah lagi, aku bisa membantumu berjualan di comiket akhir pekan minggu depan.
description.it:
L'amore non è un gioco. Nemmeno quando è ad alto tasso nerd.

Narumi e Hirotaka: professione impiegati e... otaku hardcore. Tenere segreta la passione per manga, anime e videogiochi può essere utile per essere considerati normali, ma legarsi a chi la condivide sarà la strada più agevole per trovare il vero amore?
description.ja: 隠れ腐女子のOL・成海(なるみ)と、ルックス良く有能だが重度のゲーヲタである宏嵩(ひろたか)とのヲタク同士の不器用な恋愛を描いたラブコメディ。『次にくるマンガ大賞2014』の〝本にして欲しいWebマンガ部門〟第1位、pixiv内オリジナルコミックブックマーク数歴代1位の大人気作品が多数の描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化。
description.ko:
일본 현지 420만부 돌파!
이 만화가 대단해 2016 여자편 제1위, 2018년 일본 현지 TV애니메이션 방영 확정
게임 오타쿠 X 숨덕 부녀자

숨은 부녀자인 나루미는 새로 옮긴 직장에서 잘생기고 능력 있지만 심각한 게임 오타쿠 히로타카와 재회한다. 일단 연인이 되긴 했지만 오타쿠 친구이자 서툰 두 사람에게 연애는 어렵기만 하고. 오타쿠라면 고개를 끄덕일 시추에이션 가득하다. 오타쿠가 아닌 사람이라도 피식피식 웃다가 찡 하게 눈물이 고이게 되는, 픽시브에서 연재되었던 초인기 작품이 마침내 한국 정식 발간했다.
description.pl: Narumi Momose dobrze wie, że bycie sobą nie zawsze sprawdza się w romantycznych związkach. Faceci porzucali ją już z wielu powodów. Gdy jednak jeden z nich zakończył znajomość, bo dowiedział się, że Narumi jest otaku, miarka się przebrała. Nauczona doświadczeniem, w nowej pracy nikomu nie mówi więc o swoich zainteresowaniach. Przypadek sprawia, że w tej samej firmie pracuje jej kolega z gimnazjum, a zarazem zapalony fan gier, Hirotaka Nifuji. Aby upewnić się, że jej sekret jest bezpieczny, Narumi wyciąga go na obiad i przestrzega, aby wiedzę o jej wstydliwych upodobaniach zatrzymał dla siebie. On ma jednak inną propozycję - a może by tak zostali parą?
description.pt: Apesar de Narumi Momose esconder seu gosto por histórias yaoi, seu namorado descobre tal hobby e termina o relacionamento. Para renovar sua vida, ela decide mudar de trabalho e lá acaba encontrando seu amigo de infância, Hirotaka Nifuji, um viciado em video games, que por pouco não revela o segredo de sua amiga. Então, ela decide sugerir um plano para que ele nunca mais fale sobre o assunto, mas não contava com uma contraproposta: por que não começarem a namorar? Obcecados por seus interesses pessoais, será difícil para eles manterem um relacionamento.
description.ru: Наруми — обычная офисная работница... которая втайне ото всех рисует яойную мангу. Хиротака на хорошем счету в своей компании... и в то же время он — интроверт и хардкорный геймер. Читайте историю их неуклюжей любви в романтической комедии «Так сложно любить отаку»!
description.th: นารุมิ และ ฮิโรทากะ อดีตเพื่อนสมัยเด็กที่แต่เดิมทั้งสองนั้นก็มีความชื่นชอบในวัฒนธรรมการ์ตูนและเกมอยู่แล้ว ได้กลับมาพบเจอกันอีกครั้งในฐานะเพื่อนร่วมงาน แต่ทว่าความรู้สึกบางอย่างนั้นกลับไม่เหมือนเดิม... ความสัมพันธ์ของทั้งสองจะเป็นอย่างไร จะสามารถพัฒนาจากเพื่อนสมัยเด็กกลายเป็นคนรักได้หรือไม่ นี่คือเรื่องราวความรักที่สุดแสนจะโรแมนติคคอมเมดี้ ระหว่างหนุ่มสาวโอตาคุที่กำลังเริ่มต้นขึ้น
description.uk:
Як же важко будувати стосунки отаку... Багато людей не розуміють нас і цураються, косі погляди чекають на нас практично скрізь, куди б ми не йшли. Тому що ми не такі, як оточуючі, і їх це лякає... Але ж ми теж люди і теж хочемо любові і розуміння, відчувати, що ми не самотні...

Момосе Нарумі, 26 років, отаку, раптово дізнається, що тепер працюватиме з хлопцем, якого знає з початкової школи, але з вступу до старшої вона його не бачила... Що ж принесе це їй - самотній любительці чоловічого кохання та отоме-ігор , а що йому - "фахівцеві з відеоігор" Ніфудзі Хіротаке?

Адже... так складно любити отаку...
description.es-la: ¿Puede un oficinista que es secretamente un empedernido gamer y una mujer que es en secreto una fujoshi salir sin que sus pasatiempos se entrometan en su relación o sin revelar su secreto? Para Narumi Momose no ha sido fácil encontrar pareja, cada novio la ha dejado cuando se enteran de sus aficiones, eso la ha llevado a ocultar que es una fujoshi. Pero cuando entra a su nuevo trabajo, encuentra a su amigo de la infancia Hirotaka Nifuji quien sabe de su secreta afición. Ella pensará en un plan para que no diga su secreto, pero él le hace una contrapropuesta, ¿Por qué no empiezan a salir?
description.zh-hk: 極力隱瞞自己是個腐女的粉領族‧成海，在新公司與長相帥氣又能幹，但卻是個重度電玩宅的兒時玩伴宏嵩重逢了。為了方便，提議兩人乾脆交往，於是同為阿宅的成海與宏嵩正式成為男女朋友。而公司中的另一對情侶小柳和樺倉也是阿宅，四人經常在一起喝酒聊天。作者以自己身旁的朋友為靈感，描繪出狀況不斷又有趣的阿宅戀愛故事

altTitles.ja: エデンズ ゼロ

description.en:
Shiki is a human who lives in a city filled with only robots. He considers the robots to be his best friends, and always takes care of them. Then, one day, he comes across another human - Rebecca, a girl who makes videos online to become popular. And at the same time, the robots start to go crazy?   
   
A new manga from Hiro Mashima, of [*Rave Master*](<https://mangadex.org/manga/1036>) and [*Fairy Tail*](<https://mangadex.org/manga/558>) fame.
description.ru: Она явит читателям абсолютно новую форму фэнтези. Там будет куча довольно-таки вызывающих шуток. Никакой связи с Хвостом новинка иметь не будет. В ней появится Плу из манги Rave Master.
description.tr:
İnsanların terk ettiği bir tema parkı olan Granbell Krallığı'nda artık robotlar yaşamaktadır. Robotların yanı sıra onlarla birlikte yaşamını sürdüren tek bir insan vardır: Shiki. Ömrünü sürekli bu makinelerle beraber yaşasa da günün birinde Rebecca ve kedisi Happy, bu tema parkına gelirler. Yeni ziyaretçilerin bilmediği ise Granbell'in yüzyıllar içerisindeki ilk konukları olduklarıydı. Shiki yeni arkadaşlar edinme yolunda tökezlerken robotlar bir ayaklanma başlatırlar. Doğup büyüdüğü yer artık çok tehlikeli bir hâle gelince Shiki, Rebecca ve Happy'nin uzay gemisine katılır ve uçsuz buçaksız bir uzay macerası başlar.

 [**Rave Master**](https://mangadex.org/title/5923081c-ad82-4a8b-a509-89ebe752db01) ve [**Fairy Tail**](https://mangadex.org/title/227e3f72-863f-46f9-bafe-c43104ca29ee) ile tanınan Hiro Mashima'nın yeni serisi.

title.en: Heroic Chronicles of the Three Continents

altTitles.ja: 三大陸英雄記

description.en:
Possessing memories of being born, raised, and died in a country called Japan… the young boy Hercule was born in the imperial household of a declining empire. This empire that once was a superpower that reigned over the world… is now a country nearing its end. The public finances are on bankruptcy, the military strength declined to the point that barbarians are able to wreak havoc on their territories and the neighboring countries squeezed the Empire for tribute payments every year. And the young Hercule is forced to take over this empire!  
  
Thus, the 12-year-old Hercule ascends to the throne. Using the knowledge from his previous life, Hercule struggles to rebuild the empire… reforming the tax system, revolutionizing the industry, reorganizing the public finances, rebuilding the administration, and reforming the military system. This will later be known as the story of the young emperor who restored the Lemurian empire, which would later carve its name in history as the great monarch of the three continents, the "Divine Light Emperor" Hercule the First.  
- [WN (Raw)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4694ep)

altTitles.en: I Became the Younger Sister of a Regretful Obsessive Male Lead
I Became the Younger Sister of a Regretful Obsessive Male Lead

description.en:
One day, I transmigrated to an unknown story!
 
My parents here have passed away, and it was only after being adopted by a new duke that I realized what story I transmigrated to…
 
A tragic BL webtoon where all the characters die- and at the center of it, I’m the first side character to die!
 
And on top of that, I’m destined to die by my favorite character, Lucian’s, hands?!
 
Fortunately, or unfortunately, we’re here before the start of the tragedy.
Since I’ve been adopted by the dukedom where my favorite character is, there’s still plenty of time to change the ending!
 
However…
 
I just wanted to change Lucian into a sweet guy and have a happily ever after, but why is his obsession coming towards my direction?!

altTitles.vi: Fairy Tail Nhiệm vụ Trăm năm

altTitles.th: แฟรี่เทล ภาคเควส 100 ปี ตอนที่

altTitles.ja: フェアリーテイル １００年クエスト

altTitles.zh-hk: 妖精的尾巴 百年任務

description.en:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.ru: Продолжение популярной манги "Хвост Феи" или "Фейри Тейл", которая будет носить отдельное название "100 летний квест"! После победы над Зерефом нашу любимую, еще более сильную гильдию, ждет новое приключение! Не пропустите новые приключения популярных героев!

title.en: Koishita Hito wa, Imouto no Kawari ni Shindekure to Itta

altTitles.ja: 恋した人は、妹の代わりに死んでくれと言った
恋した人は、妹の代わりに死んでくれと言った。―妹と結婚した片思い相手がなぜ今さら私のもとに?と思ったら―
恋した人は、妹の代わりに死んでくれと言った。―妹と結婚した片思い相手がなぜ今さら私のもとに?と思ったら―@COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Koishita Hito wa, Imouto no Kawari ni Shindekure to Itta: Imouto to Kekkonshita Kataomoi Aite ga Naze Imasara Watashi no Moto ni? To Omottara
Koishita Hito wa, Imouto no Kawari ni Shindekure to Itta: Imouto to Kekkon shita Kataomoi Aite ga Naze Imasara Watashi no Moto ni? to Omottara @COMIC

altTitles.en: The Person I Loved Asked Me to Die in My Younger Sister's Place

altTitles.zh: 我爱的人、让我代替妹妹去死

description.en:
In place of her sister, Wisteria took on the job of becoming a guardian of a poisonous otherworld. One day, a man who resembled her first love dropped out of the sky. His name was Lloyd. To her surprise, he was the son of her first love!

 To win the hand of the princess, he has come to ask for Wisteria's partner, Saltis, a sentient holy sword. Having survived in the other world frozen in time, Wisteria easily defeated Lloyd and told him to go home... But despite her best efforts at persuasion, Lloyd refused to leave. 

"Please take me as your apprentice, until I get strong enough to defeat you!" 

So began a one-sided relationship between master and apprentice. Will her time, which has remained frozen for so long, begin to move again? A master-student love fantasy between a lonely former noble lady and a prodigy prince!

title.en: What Does It Mean To Be...?

description.en:
After a near death experience, Angel wakes up in a new body with a new name. Everything is the same, except him; he's mysteriously become a girl. Despite claiming he used to be a boy, people treat Angelyn as if she was here from the very beginning.

This is the story of a boy who became a girl, and the journey of trying to discover what does it mean to be...
A collection of stories between two boys when they were still students.

title.en: Is it Normal to Raise a Yandere Heroine as a Villainess ?!

altTitles.zh: 身为恶役女配的我养成病娇女主很正常吧？！

description.en:
Jiang Yang was a lead designer for a popular game company until she fell to her death while gathering inspiration for a new game. After waking up in a world of cultivation, she trained tirelessly to return to her original world, when a thread of fate pulled her into the world of an otome game.

Jiang Yang quickly realizes she is in the world of the very first game she had worked on. The thread of fate connected her to Stardew, the heroine of the game who is being bullied during her first year at the Royal Academy of Magic.

As the game progresses, Jiang Yang remembers the ridiculous story the game follows, and she decides that she can’t stand by while the game makes Stardew suffer. She helps Stardew deal with the flirtatious love interest of the original game, Crown Prince Miller, and even imparts her with some of her cultivation power. To protect Stardew from the game’s story, she even puts herself in danger. However, as Jiang Yang and Stardew’s relationship becomes closer, Jiang Yang realizes that the thread of fate connecting her and Stardew is not as simple as she imagined.
description.zh: 姜央是一名为了游戏新作采风不幸摔下悬崖穿越到修真世界的游戏主美，为了回到原本的世界，姜央努力修炼，终于要飞升成神回到原本的世界，结果因为一条神秘的因果线，被强制牵引到了一个魔法世界中（还是个乙女游戏，游戏刚开始），捡到了初入魔法校园就被恶役女二欺负的的游戏女主。 姜央这时反应过来，这不就是当初让自己穿越的那个倒霉换皮游戏吗？而自己的因果线就连接在了游戏女主星露的身上。姜央以为只要跟着游戏通关，自己就能回到最初的现实世界，但是随着游戏发展，姜央再次回想起了煞笔策划写的沙雕剧情，看着星露受苦，具有强烈责任心和道德感的姜央选择对星露出手相助，不仅要帮对方清理花心皇子那些烂桃花，还传授修真技巧以防对方被其他学生霸凌，甚至有时还得搭上自己的身子！！随着姜央和星露的交往越来越密切，姜央发现自己在星露身上的因果线没有自己想象中那么简单……
